tasks.title: 🔥 CRITICAL: Fix listTasks Duplication in MCP Server
tasks.description: Eliminate the critical duplication in handleListTasks() where tasks.json is read twice and table is generated twice. MCP server reads tasks, generates table, then calls core.listTasks() which reads tasks again. This causes 2x file I/O and 2x memory usage per request.

activityLog.message: Task created with title: "🔥 CRITICAL: Fix listTasks Duplication in MCP Server"
Status changed from "todo" to "inprogress". Message: Starting to fix listTasks duplication in MCP Server
Status changed from "inprogress" to "done". Message: Fixed listTasks duplication by eliminating double file I/O and double table generation in handleListTasks function

tasks.title: 🔥 CRITICAL: Optimize writeTasks Hidden Complexity
tasks.description: Optimize writeTasks() function which currently triggers expensive priority recalculation and table generation on every write. This hidden complexity makes simple write operations take 50-100ms. Need to make these operations conditional or cached.

activityLog.message: Task created with title: "🔥 CRITICAL: Optimize writeTasks Hidden Complexity"
Status changed from "todo" to "inprogress". Message: Starting to optimize writeTasks hidden complexity that triggers expensive priority recalculation and table generation on every write

Status changed from "inprogress" to "done". Message: Optimized writeTasks function by making priority recalculation and table generation conditional, reducing simple write operations from 50-100ms to much faster

tasks.title: 🔥 CRITICAL: Implement Task Data Caching Layer
tasks.description: Implement a caching layer to eliminate the excessive readTasks()/writeTasks() pattern where almost every function reads tasks.json at start and writes at end. Found 19 readTasks() and 12 writeTasks() calls causing massive file I/O overhead.

Status changed from "todo" to "inprogress". Message: Starting to implement task data caching layer to eliminate excessive readTasks/writeTasks pattern
Status changed from "inprogress" to "done". Message: Implemented task data caching layer with 5-second TTL to eliminate excessive readTasks/writeTasks file I/O pattern

tasks.title: 🔥 CRITICAL: Eliminate Redundant Data Representations
tasks.description: Eliminate redundant data representations where the same task data is stored as JSON + Markdown + Statistics + Analysis without caching. This causes memory multiplication and sync complexity. Implement lazy loading and single source of truth.

activityLog.message: Task created with title: "🔥 CRITICAL: Eliminate Redundant Data Representations"
Status changed from "todo" to "inprogress". Message: Starting to eliminate redundant data representations where same task data is stored as JSON + Markdown + Statistics + Analysis

Status changed from "inprogress" to "done". Message: Eliminated redundant data representations by implementing lazy loading and caching for derived formats (Markdown, statistics, task files) with 10-second TTL

tasks.title: Enforce Verification in MCP updateStatus Handler
tasks.description: Modify the MCP server's updateStatus handler to enforce verification checks. When AI tries to mark a task as 'done', the system must check canMarkAsDone() and block the update if verification fails. This is the critical enforcement point that prevents bypassing.
